answers.answer: Hello.It's disturbing when you have such sudden unexpected problems.An increased frequency of urination may be caused by either Diabetes or some Kidney problem. In Diabetes, you also have increased thirst along with increased urination frequency.I would like to know the name of the specific urine test that was increased. You should also consider consulting a Urologist (if not consulted already).Regards

question: Today, after woke up, my left leg become numb from the knee down.  It only numb half of my feet from the big toe to the hill of the foot and left half of my leg from my knee down to my foot.  After one hour or two, i decided to go to the emergency and they cannot figure out what the problem is.  They took my blood and urine test and my urine test showed that my kidney level is about a point higher than what is should be.  My blood result came back negative and normal.Other systom i recent have, such as constant headache that go off and on.  In addition, recently i've been urinating regulary than normal regarless i drink a lot of water or not.  Please email me back with any suggestions.  Thank you
title: Unexplain systom and doctor are clueless
